{{Wired embedded system |brand=Pine64 |model=PINE A64 |revision=+ (2GB) |asin=B01MRZFYQO;GB; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |price=29 |est_release_date=02/2016 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A64 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G0846E |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Micro SD card slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0524P;;2;,,, 300mA Dual-Channel Ultra Low Drop Out Voltage Regulator;TI;LP3986;;1;,,, White LED 3A Current Limit Step-Up Converter;Silicon Standard;SS6635;;1;,,, 30V 1A High Performance Boost Converter;LowPower Semi;LP3315;;1;,,, 1.5A Power Switch w/ Programmable Current Limit;LowPower Semi;LPW5210;;2; |flags=HDMI 1.4, Audio in/out (3.5mm), RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot;2014.07; |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Armbian, Debian, Win10 (IoT) |oui_eth=02:BA:AE }} {{TagLine|64-bit Single Board Computer}} :[https://www.pine64.org/devices/single-board-computers/pine-a64/ Product Page] {{â€¢}} [https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/PINE_A64 Documentation]
"Designed in Silicon Valley, California. Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "A64-DB-2G-Rev B" and "2016-03-21" is silkscreened on board.
{{See also|Pine64|Allwinner}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A64 @1.152GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE LAN port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Micro-B
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/15-dollar-sbc-features-quad-core-64-bit-allwinner-a4-pi-expansion/ ''$15 SBC features quad-core 64-bit Allwinner A64 SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/09/pine-a64-development-board-kickstarter-campaign-is-up/ ''PINE A64 Development Board Kickstarter Campaign'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/05/31/pine-a64-board-quick-start-guide-benchmarks-with-android-5-1/ ''Pine A64 Board Quick Start Guide & Benchmarks with Android 5.1'' on '''CNX|Software''']
